title: Consider the focus of practice
text: Think about how practice is more related to personal development and less about external validation or compensation.

title: Focus on the main benefits of practice
text: The primary benefits of practice often involve improving skills, enhancing presentation delivery, and refining transitions between ideas.

title: Distinguish personal gains from professional incentives
text: Remember that practice focuses on personal skill enhancement rather than using time for billing or workplace proof of busy-ness.

hintAnswer: When you practice, you can count those hours and bill for them and/or use them to convince your boss you're really working.
title: Not all activities during practice are work-related
text: Why would practicing not typically be used to justify billable hours at work?
choices: Practice helps you ensure you're helping your audience feels the story's emotional parts $$-$$ that you're performing.
Practice helps you make sure you're emphasizing the right parts in a presentation.
Practice allows you to hear and fix problems with transitions between ideas.
When you practice, you can count those hours and bill for them and/or use them to convince your boss you're really working.
